title: alignoscope
translationTitle: Chinese Translation by Fu Lei (傅雷)
manual:
Search Instructions:

  • Enter French keywords in the left box and Chinese keywords in the right box
  • Use spaces to separate multiple keywords (logical AND)
  • Use | to separate alternatives (logical OR)
  • Use _ to replace space in exact phrases
  • Use .* to represent any characters
  • Words in "does not contain" boxes will be excluded

Color Legend:

  • Dark green: matches search terms in both languages
  • Light green: matches search terms in one language but not the other
  • No fill: does not match any search terms

Popup Border Colors:

  • Blue: contains search terms ("contains")
  • Red: contains excluded terms ("does not contain")
  • Black: no matches in either language for positive or negative terms
pres:
Alignoscope is a bilingual aligned text search tool, specially designed for exploring and analyzing French-Chinese parallel corpora.

This tool is based on the original French text of "Jean-Christophe" and its Chinese translation by Fu Lei.

We thank all those who have contributed to this project.
